collection.name: Hero Description
collection.description: The hero description that will display in this category

page.name: Member Benefits Image
page.description: Header image for member benefits page

product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Age group
product.description: Defines the target age range for a product, such as adults or kids

product.name: Dress occasion
product.description: Specifies the intended occasion for a dress, e.g. holiday, everyday

product.name: Dress style
product.description: Identifies the design of a dress, such as wrap or empire waist

product.name: Neckline
product.description: Used to describe the neck shape of a garment, such as V-neck or boat

product.name: Size
product.description: Used to specify the size of a product, such as 0-3 months or Extra large (XL)

product.name: Fabric
product.description: Identifies the type of fabric used in a product, for example, cotton or denim

product.name: Target gender
product.description: Identifies the intended gender for a product, such as female, male or unisex

product.name: Top length type
product.description: Defines the length of tops or shirts, like crop top or long

product.name: Product certifications & standards
product.description: Indicates the certifications or standards a product meets, such as organic or cruelty free

product.name: Product form
product.description: Defines the format or presentation of a product, typically for health and beauty; e.g. lotion, serum

product.name: Skin care effect
product.description: Defines the intended benefits of skin care products, e.g. anti-aging, plumping

product.name: Suitable for skin type
product.description: Specifies products for specific skin conditions, such as dry, aging, or sensitive

product.name: Package type
product.description: Defines the type of packaging for a product, e.g. jar, pump

product.name: Constitutive ingredients
product.description: Specifies the main components used in a product's formulation, e.g. beeswax, rosehip oil

product.name: Bundly Extra Data
product.description: Extra data to display on the bundle page

product.name: Conditioner effect
product.description: Defines the benefits of a hair conditioner, such as smoothing or anti-dandruff

product.name: Suitable for hair type
product.description: Specifies the hair needs a product is designed for, e.g. curly, fine

product.name: Fragrance
product.description: Defines if a product is scented or not, e.g. floral, unscented

product.name: Search product boosts
product.description: List of search queries for which a product gets higher rank in search results

product.name: Related products
product.description: List of related products

product.name: Related products settings
product.description: Determines how related products are displayed along with algorithmic product recommendations

product.name: Complementary products
product.description: List of complementary products

product.name: Power source
product.description: Specifies the power source a product uses to operate, such as solar or batteries

product.name: Google: Custom Product
product.description: Use to indicate whether or not the unique product identifiers (UPIs) GTIN, MPN, and brand are available for your product.

product.name: Dispenser type
product.description: Specifies the format for dispensing the product, typically in health and beauty; e.g. stick, jar

product.name: Active ingredient
product.description: Identifies primary substances in personal care items, e.g. vitamin A, retinol

product.name: Moisturizer type
product.description: Identifies the usage time of the moisturizer, like all day or night care

product.name: Toothpaste type
product.description: Defines the specific function of toothpaste, such as anti-decay or whitening

product.name: Shampoo type
product.description: Classifies shampoos based on their formulation, such as powder or 2-in-1

product.name: Cosmetic function
product.description: Defines the intended benefit or effect of a cosmetic product, e.g. soothing, healing

product.name: Skin care features
product.description: Identifies the benefits of skin care items, such as long lasting or UVA/UVB protection

product.name: Cleaning surfaces
product.description: Identifies the suitable surfaces for a cleaning product, such as glass surfaces or stovetops

product.name: Ingredients
product.description: Specifies the components used in a product's formulation, e.g. zinc oxide, aloe vera

product.name: Dry/Wet cleaning
product.description: Specifies if products are suitable for dry or wet cleaning

product.name: Brush material
product.description: Specifies the type of material used in brush construction, such as silicone or plastic

product.name: Why this brings us joy
product.description: Why this product brings us joy text area

product.name: Dietary preferences
product.description: Helps identify products suitable for specific diets, e.g. vegan, nut free

product.name: Allergen information
product.description: Indicates potential allergens present in food or beverages, such as wheat or peanuts

product.name: Pasta type
product.description: Classifies pasta products by their specific shape or form, e.g. macaroni, penne

product.name: Food product form
product.description: Specifies the form in which the food product is presented, such as dried or frozen

product.name: Heat level
product.description: Indicates the spiciness of food and beverage products, such as mild or very hot

product.name: Scent
product.description: Specifies the fragrance or aroma of a product, such as vanilla or citrus

product.name: Packing materials included
product.description: Identifies the type of packing materials provided, like air pillows or bubble wrap

product.name: Tea input type
product.description: Specifies the preparation style of tea, e.g. bags, K-cups

product.name: Flavor
product.description: Specifies the taste or flavor of a product, e.g. vanilla, mint

product.name: Product rating
product.description: Average rating from customers

product.name: Product rating count
product.description: Total number of ratings from customers

product.name: Application method
product.description: Defines how a product is applied or used, e.g. gel, liquid, spray

product.name: Washing method
product.description: Specifies the recommended cleaning process for a product, e.g. hand washing, machine washing

product.name: Laundry detergent features
product.description: Describes special characteristics of laundry detergent, like color protection or stain removal

product.name: Material
product.description: Defines a product's primary material, such as cotton or wool

product.name: Nut butter variety
product.description: Identifies the nut variety in nut-based spreads, e.g. peanut, almond

variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 0
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns.

variant.name: Google: Size System
variant.description: The country of the size system used by your product.

variant.name: Google: Gender
variant.description: The gender for which your product is intended.

variant.name: Google: Condition
variant.description: The condition of your product at time of sale.

variant.name: Google: Age Group
variant.description: The demographic for which your product is intended.
